overview: Before joining Irdeto as CFO in June 2010, Germon Knoop was CFO APAC for BT ( British Telecom ) based out of Hong Kong. Prior to that, Germon held several VP Finance or regional CFO functions with global multinational corporations like Lucent Technologies, Textron and K2. In addition, Germon gained his professional experience in auditing and in transaction services with PWC in Germany. Germon has led finance teams in various regions in Europe, Middle East and Africa, and Asia Pacific. Germon’s origin is from the Netherlands and he lived in Amsterdam, Hong Kong and Munich, Germany. He holds an executive MBA from Kingston University in England, as well as a BA degree in both auditing and accounting.
